ygData.subject: RE: The GUK Trip.
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed.  Let distribute those stuffs only can be used by those who are physically involved in the hunt.  I m merely joking when I say I want those non-wiz
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed. Let distribute those stuffs only can be used by those who are
physically involved in the hunt. I'm merely joking when I say I want those
non-wiz stuffs for sales.

Another alternative it to use alpha loot, we sort out how we wanna exchange
later, coz when there is only 1 bard item with 2 bards ard, it's hard to
decide who to get it ;) Anyway the magi can summon dimension bag, u can
keep it at weightless, so no problem in carrying loot. Even for caster,
our reagents r only 0.1 stone each, carry 100 only weight 10 stones. Using
dimension bag sure no problem. But when it come to junk, throw it awat or
give to those who can carry and sell la.

Perhap we shld find another day get those weightless containers ;)

Ziltus

p/s: If u LD, the dimension bags and the content will still be there when u
relogin, tested with myself few times.

On Friday, 06 August, 1999 6:28 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> ok, alot of stuff is wanted by everyone, so we better work something out
becos its obvious that we may (or even maynot) get one of those stuff and
everyone wants them. Judging from this, maybe i should just go n work on my
levels instead of getting items since everyone wants so many things... how
bout everyone just is able to list ONE item that he really really wants...
or several of lesser value... otherwise the trip is gonna turn out to be
more of a nitemare than benefit for us...
>
> Nicademous
> p/s : i think those that want stuff for their 2nd or 3rd char is
unfair... bcos theres just too many folks queueing up for the stuff...
unless u want to bring ya 2nd or 3rd char along then thats another story.
thats wat i think... pls feedback...
>
